BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTPAY_DUMMY_PROF_DTL T SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? AND T.GNUM_SL_NO=?

DELETE FROM ACTPAY_EXT_DED_SPECS_TRN T WHERE T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? AND T.DT_OF_APPLICABLE=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1
